summary: AN ORDINANCE accepting deeds to portions of the L. M. Collins Donation Claim No. 46, in Section 21, Township 24 North, Range 4 East, W.M. (South Ferdinand Street, et al; Paving, etc.); and to portions of the southwest one-quarter of Section 35, Township 26 North, Range 3 East, W.M. (Extension 30th Avenue Northwest at Northwest 91st Street and Widen Northwest 91st Street between 30th and 31st Avenues Northwest) for street purposes.
